form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Cassidy (for himself and Mr. Blumenthal) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to limit the coinsurance amount for certain services furnished in an ambulatory surgical center.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Medicare Beneficiary Co-Pay Fairness Act.

subsection.text: Section 1833 of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395l) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (a)(1)(G), by inserting subject to subsection (ee), before with respect to facility services; and
by adding at the end the following new subsection:

subsection.header: Limitation on coinsurance amount for certain services furnished in an ambulatory surgical center
subsection.text: In the case that application of subsection (a)(1)(G) would result in the imposition of a coinsurance amount with respect to facility services described in such subsection furnished during a year with respect to a surgical procedure that exceeds the amount of the inpatient hospital deductible established under section 1813(b) for such year, the Secretary shall—

paragraph.text: reduce the amount of such coinsurance to an amount equal to such deductible; and
pay to the supplier furnishing such services an amount equal to such reduction.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply to services furnished on or after January 1, 2026.
